column5: I am going to Vermilion Bay area. Are there any weather channels that I will be able to get on my VHF Marine radio?Thanks,Fritz
does it have a scanner function, just put it on that.

I have a marine safety booklet i got at the all canada show here in chicago last winter and all it says about radios is " to make a distress call use channel 16 or 156.8Mhz." I dont know if any one will hear you but I have read the some of the resorts with a fleet of guide boats out like tomahawk have marine radios on ther boat and monitor that channel. I have one so I will have to call a radio check and see if anyone responds. I am going up the 31st hope the fishing s good and i dont find too many rocks.
